name: Stickman Killing Arena
description:
--!Warning! Lots of blood, shooting and dubstep!--

Assume the role of a stickman and kill and destroy your enemies in this free 3d war game! Use all your guns and power ups to smash your opponents to death. You will have access to both shooter ( gun ) weapons and also awesomer weapons such as rockets and lava balls. Once they die you will see their ragdoll death animations. The enemy stickmen must be killed! As a famous stickman once said, Kill kill kill!!




music:ParagonX9_ChaozImpact
